message.body: Hey hey hey! How goes it? Any marinated thoughts on my email? Any questions come up that I can answer?
Yes! I'll email some thoughts later today. No questions as of yet
Ah! Wonderful! Looking forward to that then.
How's the continued arctic chill up there?
I dunno, im in philly waiting for the amtrak, but it seems to be just as frigid here
Haha. Yup that's not vt. But I think we've all got a cold advisory. New Yorkers are very cranky about it.
